sentences.sentence: We might try to clear up some of the cabins in the superstructure.
sentences.translation: 我们或许可以设法清理出船上层的一些客舱。

sentences.sentence: With the change of the economic foundation，the superstructure has to be transformed too.
sentences.translation: 随着经济基础的改变，上层建筑也必须改变。（随着）

sentences.sentence: UML 2. UML 2 is an EMF-based implementation of the UML 2.1 Superstructure specification.
sentences.translation: UML 2 。 UML 2 是一个基于 EMF 的 UML 2.1 子结构规格说明的实现。
